title: 1969년 Roy Lee Smartt v. C. Murray Henderson, Warden, Tennessee State Penitentiary 사건
summary: 미국 USA, Federal 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Roy Lee Smartt v. C. Murray Henderson, Warden, Tennessee State Penitentiary. 판결일: 1969-05-15. 법원: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Roy Lee SMARTT, Petitioner-Appellant, v. C. Murray HENDERSON, Warden, Tennessee State Penitentiary, Respondent-Appellee
**판결일**: 1969-05-15
**법원**: Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit
**관할**: USA, Federal

**판사**: Cecil, Combs, McCREE, Per Curiam

## 변호인

Roy Lee Smartt in pro. per., James M. Tharpe, Sp. Counsel, State of Tennessee, Memphis, Tenn., for ap-pellee.

## 인용

- 411 F.2d 406

## 판결문 요약

411 F.2d 406
    Roy Lee SMARTT, Petitioner-Appellant,v.C. Murray HENDERSON, Warden, Tennessee State Penitentiary, Respondent-Appellee.
    No. 18908.
    United States Court of Appeals Sixth Circuit.
    May 15, 1969.
    
      Roy Lee Smartt in pro. per.
      James M. Tharpe, Sp. Counsel, State of Tennessee, Memphis, Tenn., for appellee.
      Before McCREE and COMBS, Circuit Judges, and CECIL, Senior Circuit Judge.
      PER CURIAM.
    
    
      1
      Roy Lee Smartt, petitioner-appellant, appeals from an order of the United States District Court for the Western District of Tennessee denying his petition for a writ of habeas corpus. The appellant is serving a fifteen year sentence for armed robbery in the Tennessee penitentiary at Nashville.
    
    
      2
      Counsel for appellee filed a motion to dismiss the appeal under Rule 8(b) of the rules of this court for the reason that it is manifest that the questions on which the decision of the cause depends are so unsubstantial as to need no further argument. No reponse was filed to this motion on behalf of the appellant. The motion and the appeal were submitted to the court upon the record from the District Court without briefs or oral argument.
    
    
      3
      The appellant was given an evidentiary hearing in the Criminal Court of Shelby County, Tennessee on a petition for a writ of habeas corpus raising the same questions as are now before the court on this appeal. The petition was denied by the State Co...
